Class DebugUtils

java.lang.Object
com.gmail.aydinov.sergey.simple_debugger_plugin.utils.DebugUtils
public class DebugUtils extends Object
Utility class for JDI (Java Debug Interface) operations

Author: Sergei Aidinov
Email: sergey.aydinov@gmail.com

    • createJdiObjectFromString

      public static Value createJdiObjectFromString(VirtualMachine virtualMachine, Type varType, String textValue, ThreadReference threadReference)
      Creates a JDI Value from a string to set it to a local variable or field.
      Parameters:
      virtualMachine - Target process VirtualMachine
      varType - Variable type (LocalVariable.type() or Field.type())
      textValue - String value from UI
      threadReference - Thread where boxed objects are created

    • mapFields

      public static List<VariableDTO> mapFields(Map<Field,Value> fields)
      Converts Map<Field, Value> to List<VariableDTO>.
      Parameters:
      fields - the map of fields and their values
      Returns:
      list of VariableDTO representing fields

    • mapLocals

      public static List<VariableDTO> mapLocals(Map<LocalVariable,Value> locals)
      Converts Map<LocalVariable, Value> to List<VariableDTO>.
      Parameters:
      locals - the map of local variables and their values
      Returns:
      list of VariableDTO representing local variables

      public static List<Value> parseArguments(VirtualMachine virtualMachine, UserInvokedMethodEvent userInvokedMethodEvent)
      Converts argumentsText to a list of JDI values for method invocation
